mapper.insert: insert into cs_faq (BBSO_NO, TTL, CN, KWRD, USE_YN, FST_REGR, LAST_UPDR) values (#{BBSO_NO}, #{TTL}, #{CN}, #{KWRD}, #{USE_YN}, #{FST_REGR}, #{LAST_UPDR})
mapper.select: select BBSO_NO, TTL, CN, KWRD, USE_YN, FST_REG, FST_REGR, LAST_UPD, LAST_UPDR from cs_faq order by BBSO_NO desc
select BBSO_NO, TTL, CN, KWRD, USE_YN, FST_REG, FST_REGR, LAST_UPD, LAST_UPDR from cs_faq order by BBSO_NO desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
